body_html:
Sorry for the late response. I have been thinking about addressing the issue of #12019 while at the same time limit the changes to foldr/foldl (vs. TensorArray) but couldn't find an easy way to get around that. For now I think it probably make sense to close this PR. I will keep the issue #12019 in mind and if I could find some way to make it work then will reopen.

Thanks all for the help and sorry for the inconvenience.

body:
Sorry for the late response. I have been thinking about addressing the issue of  #12019  while at the same time limit the changes to `foldr/foldl` (vs. TensorArray) but couldn't find an easy way to get around that. For now I think it probably make sense to close this PR. I will keep the issue #12019 in mind and if I could find some way to make it work then will reopen.

Thanks all for the help and sorry for the inconvenience.
